name: Fat Panda's Life sucks
description:
Fat Panda's Life sucks is a 2D platform where you jump to the tower of the level. Panda falls to the verge of his death. But he smells something nice, and he is going to find out what it is. For some odd reason he can't stop farting. Can this day get any worse. BE careful once you fall you'll have to go back up again. (Might be frustrating and difficult for most people) Are you up for the challenge?

WASD- movement

Shift- walk

Space- jump (hold space to jump higher)

SERIOUSLY THIS GAME IS DIFFICULT, I CANNOT STRESS ENOUGHT HOW DIFFICULT IT IS, EVEN I FIND IT HARD.  PURE PAIN. NO EASY MODE.

I applaud if you guys can actually beat it.
